name: sunith vs

top_projects.name: devb.io
top_projects.description: DevB.io seamlessly transforms your GitHub footprint into a living, breathing portfolio. Powered by AI, it tells your developer story while you focus on what matters most: writing great code. No more portfolio maintenance headaches, just pure coding brilliance on display.

top_projects.name: marine-science
top_projects.description: A Django-based web application for managing marine science conference registrations, abstract submissions, and payments. The system provides a complete solution for conference organization, including user authentication, payment processing, and content management.

top_projects.name: RideBook
top_projects.description: A Django-based ride-sharing platform API that implements core functionalities similar to Uber. This project provides a robust backend system for managing ride bookings, user authentication, and real-time ride tracking.

top_projects.name: youtube-video-summarisation
top_projects.description: A Django web application that generates concise summaries of YouTube videos using Natural Language Processing (NLP). The application extracts the transcript from YouTube videos and creates a summary highlighting the key points.

top_projects.name: git-session
top_projects.description: a project to learn git and github

sunithvs/git-session.summary: There have been numerous updates to the 'git-session' repository on February 6th, with 9 new HTML files and 7 pull requests created respectively. Various contributors including Aman, Anand, and Amritha have made significant contributions to the repository.

aswinpradeepc/marine_sc.summary: On February 6th and 7th, the 'marine_sc' repository has seen several updates, including speaker card modifications, phone number updates, and some minor fixes. The changes indicate a refinement of the speaker card functionality and some backend modifications.

sunithvs/kph-products.summary: The 'kph-products' repository has experienced a significant number of activity on February 8th, with multiple 'init' operations initiated in a short period of time. However, due to the lack of further information, the purpose behind these updates is unclear.

profile_summary: As a backend developer with 8+ years of experience, I leverage my expertise in Python, TypeScript, and C to build scalable and efficient software solutions. With a strong foundation in computer science and a portfolio of 113 public repositories, I continually innovate and refine my skills in a collaborative environment. My work at Eduport has shaped me into a passionate engineer whose focus on quality and reliability drives my approach to problem-solving and code craftsmanship.
